abstracts.cdata!:
This report on the Second Rural and Main
            Roads Project of Guatemala provides the findings of an INT
            administrative inquiry (the Investigation) into allegations
            of corrupt, fraudulent, collusive, and/or coercive
            practices, as defined by the WBG for purposes of its own
            policies, rules and procedures (the WBG's Framework
            regarding Anti-corruption), in relation to the WBG-supported
            activities. The purpose of the Investigation was to allow
            the WBG to determine if the WBG's Framework regarding
            Anti-corruption has been violated. This Report is being
            shared to ensure that its recipients are aware of the
            results of the INT Investigation.
